answers.answer: hi linda i have your symtoms but have a neurology problem perhaps you should visit your doctor. my lip also goes numb like i have been to the dentist,tarter

question: Hi my name is Linda and I am 35 yrs old and lately  I have been having a lot of foot cramps which are getting worse and keeping me up at night. I also have been having tingling in my bottom lip for about a week. I am very tired and seem to run into things alot also. Just want to know if this is a sign of diabetes or something else??
title: foot cramps and lip tingling
